item.title: Data structures with Go - Part I
item.description: Data Structures With Go - Part I Data structures are everywhere. Every developer should know them, starting from the most common ones. The data structure priorly describes how the data is organised, accessed, associated and processed. Using data structures you can keep your data in memory and access them in an efficient fashion. You should pick the data structure that is the most suitable for your purposes in order to minimize space in memory and access time.
